==Trivia==
* Though the south side of Opet Hall appears to connect to the [[Great Hall of Truths]], the player cannot access the Great Hall of Truths from this direction and must go through [[Duat Hall]] instead.
===Etymology===
* The {{w|Opet Festival}} was an annual Ancient Egyptian Festival celebrated in Thebes.
